Owlhawk emerged a bit peckish.

Owlhawk:  Hey I'm going to get something to eat.....oh
I hope you can eat energon, now that you're part
machine.  We don't have any actual food so far as I
know.

He led her to the Mess Hall and handed her an energon
cube.

--- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote:
> After some times of this repairing sleep, the galaxy
> commander came 
> out of the chamber. Her human metabolism kept her
> sleepy, as she 
> rubbed her eyes to shake away the slumber.
> 
> She waited for Owlhawk, eager to fight the Maximal's
> enemies.
>

> wrote:
> > Owlhawk enters a chamber as well.
> >

> > > OOC: I prefer to think of them as humans in
> metal
> > > shells.
> > >

> > >

> > > > >

> two
> > > > > corridors.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Katya: I am glad that you learn fast. For

> > > > > though, we will put 
> > > > > your education on hold. We should repair
> from
> > > our
> > > > > fight... at least I 
> > > > > should. After that, I think we should report
> for
> > > > > duty. So... how and 
> > > > > where do I take care of my wounds?
> > > > > 
> > > > > She still was not used to be a machine, and
> > > somehow,
> > > > > it scared her a 
> > > > > bit. She now shared a skin-deep - no,
> soul-deep
> > > bond
> > > > > with her mech.

> wrote:

> > > course,
> > > > > she
> > > > > > > couldn't expect him 
> > > > > > > to know everything, but she did expect
> > > something
> > > > > > > else.
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Katya: Drawing first blood? Of course,
> it is
> > > an
> > > > > > > approach that 
> > > > > > > minimizes losses, but where is the fun
> in
> > > that?

> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Katya: The bidding ritual is done in two
> > > parts.
> > > > > > > Before a battle, we 
> > > > > > > issue a batchall -a battle challenge-
> and
> > > ask
> > > > > what
> > > > > > > forces the defender 
> > > > > > > will use. After that, two commanders bid
> > > against
> > > > > > > each other to bring 
> > > > > > > to least troops possible to achieve
> victory.
> > > > > > >

> > > > > <dewboy30816@y...>
> > > > > > > wrote:

> a
> > > pre

> > > > > > > either

> > > > > > > > to the first damage rather than death

> > > > > determine
